p: The methanol extract of D. longicornu protocorms was evaluated for its antioxidant effect by scavenging the DPPH free radicals. Extract has shown a capacity of scavenge 94.31 % of DPPH free radicals at 1000 μg/mL concentration. The scavenging capacity of extract was found statistically significantly similar to that of same concentration of ascorbic acid (96.19 %), a positive control. The concentration of extract required to scavenge 50 % DPPH free radicals (IC 50) was found as 117.56 μg/mL, however, IC 50 value of ascorbic acid was 84.47 μg/mL. Statistically, IC 50 values of extract and control were significantly different ( Table 2).
